articles.content: London: Britains barnstorming coronavirus vaccine rollout is being credited with a 60 per cent drop in symptomatic cases and 80 per cent fall in hospital admissions, clearing the way for the economys… [+1251 chars]
articles.description: Once the hardest-hit country in Europe, the number of infections, hospitalisations and deaths in Britain have collapsed.
articles.title: Barnstorming vaccine effort key to dramatic reversal of UK’s COVID crisis - Sydney Morning Herald

articles.author: Clive Hammond
articles.description: THE EUROPEAN UNION's future was on the brink after experts claimed the likes of Denmark had to 'curtail' its links to Brussels - or face long-term 'political stalemate' inside the bloc.
articles.title: EU on brink: Denmark warned it must curtail bloc or face long-term 'political stalemate' - Daily Express
